 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּרְפַּס‎</span> **noun masculine** ==cotton== (or fine linen (loan-word from Sanskrit <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***karpâsa***</u></abbr>, ***cotton***, Persian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fine linen***; hence also <span class="bdbLangGreek">κάρπασος</span>, ***carbasus***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרְפְּסָא‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Arm. Stud. § 1148</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְכֵלֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּר כ‎</span> [[Esth.1.6|Esth 1:6]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">καρπασίνοις</span>): compare [[BDB#Cels|Cels.]]<sup>Hierob. ii. 157 ff</sup>.
